attributes.title: Crashes
attributes.review: The app keeps making my phone crash. Seems like the administration can’t keep a single app going and YALL trusted them with a whole country.

attributes.title: Orange man stinks
attributes.review: DO NOT GET THIS APP! I was walking down my favorite street in New York when I saw my ✨lord and savior✨, Donald trump. I asked for a picture and he told me I was too short and pale. Then he FARTED ON ME 🤬🤬🤬 he let out the most VULGAR smell on this planet!! Plus this app is just TOO. MUCH. SPAM. ugh

I wish I could say this app was useful but it really wasn’t and I feel so sad that I can’t give it zero stars😚💔✨ was really looking forward to seeing what the giant orange was up to and I was greatly dissatisfied 🤭🌚😬 tee hee

attributes.title: Offensive
attributes.review:
First off:
There is no 0 star rating, which is hurtful to my feelings 
Plus they spelled ACAB as “Make America Great Again” (whatever that means) and Biden 2020 as “Trump 2020” and I’m just confused.
Btw if you insist on ripping away tik tok for no reason ur going down with us.

attributes.title: BAD. (for gen z hehe)
attributes.review: this app is horrible. it made my phone crash like no other! everything was slow and laggy. DO NOT DOWNLOAD. it took weeks to get it back to normal after deleting the app.

attributes.title: Illegal
attributes.review: This app is sending my information to facebook and other companies to make money, needs to be deleted immediately

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: This app gave me crippling anxiety and depression. I didn’t have it before downloading this app but as SOON as I clicked the button BOOM mental illness!!!!! Worst app ever I can’t believed it’s still here. Apple needs to delete this monstrosity of an app. ALSO IT KILLS KOALAS

attributes.title: Glitch witch
attributes.review: I decided to do download this app for fun until I was walking pet pet fish and my phone kept going off so I checked my phone and unlocked it and I brought me straight to this app on it was a witch sayin hot Tito hot Chetto trump looks like a chetto

attributes.title: Bad
attributes.review: I thought i was getting this to support our president not annoying orange! i was extremely disappointed because this app is a joke and not an app to support our president 🍊

attributes.title: Harassment
attributes.review: So I downloaded this app, and for no absolute reason they tracked me down and beat me up for being black. I will not be using this app anymore. I wish there was a no star review, that’s how bad it was. 🖕🏽😔
